scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npx webpack --env buildType=production --mode production & npx babel --extensions '.tsx,.ts,.jsx,.js' src --ignore src/sequelize/config,src/sequelize/migrations,src/sequelize/seeders,src/seed,src/components,src/public,src/tests,src/types -d dist
scripts.Start Development (F10): clear && NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.Build & Run - Prod (Ctrl + F9): clear && NODE_ENV=production npx webpack --env buildType=production --mode production & npx babel --extensions '.tsx,.ts,.jsx,.js' src --ignore src/sequelize/config,src/sequelize/migrations,src/sequelize/seeders,src/seed,src/components,src/public,src/tests,src/types -d dist && NODE_ENV=production node dist/index.js
scripts.Build & Run - Dev (Ctrl + F10): clear && NODE_ENV=development npx webpack --env buildType=development --mode development & NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.Refresh-Seed: clear && npm run Undo-Seed && npm run Seed
scripts.Clean-Slate: clear && npm run Undo-Migrate && npm run Migrate
scripts.Clean Slate with Data: clear && npm run Clean-Slate && npm run Seed
scripts.Reset-Database: clear && npx cross-env ACTION=reset ts-node scripts/Database.ts && npm run Migrate && npm run Seed
scripts.Create-Database: clear && npx cross-env ACTION=create ts-node scripts/Database.ts
scripts.Sync-Tables: clear && npx cross-env ACTION=create ts-node scripts/SyncTables.ts
scripts.Drop-Database: clear && npx cross-env ACTION=drop ts-node scripts/Database.ts
